website_summaries.verdict: A chandelier to consider when you want the authentic candlelight experience at a budget price. Extremely durable and easy to assemble.
pros: Subtle design blends in well with surrounding decor
Included light shades allow plenty of candlelight to seep through the chandelier
cons: Requires additional chain in order to install correctly

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for out under my gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for out under my gazebo. I hot glued the glass cups onto their stand so the wind would not knock them off. I got some votives that have a remote control. It is not to heavy for the Gazebo hook. I love it! D Rae
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Good: Cheap, real iron, real glass Bad: Cheaply made. Iron is not bent right. Some candle holders are bent at a strange angle. (see my photos). Glass candle holders are rejects/seconds. The cups are badly formed, not quite round, and would not even qualify as a dollar store product. Also, this thing is made for the outside, yet, there is nothing to hold the glass candle holders onto the iron frame. A bit of wind is all it would take to break every one. Also, the gems are made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas West

customer_reviews.title: Love my new outdoor chandelier.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised and came in on time. Because I hang my chandelier outside, I used a hot glue gun to glue the glasses to the metal. I highly recommend you do this to prevent the glasses from falling and breaking. I gave this a four instead of a five because some of the glasses are not completely flat on the inside and is difficult for the candles to lay flat. Nevertheless it’s great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews stated the glass is not attached, but I just used a bit of E6000 to attach the glass to the chandelier. The glass does have some imperfections, but having it hang from a gazebo they are not visible. It is pretty solid, not flimsy. All in all I'm happy with it, especially the price. Because of that I can't complain about the minor things. In order to hang it you will need to get your own chain, which I also found on Amazon for about $10.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, just like picture but the glass holders had some imperfections around the rims, nothing that will cause issues but definitely a cosmetic problem. Also, one of the beaded chains was not connected and the piece that they connect to wasnt in the box which leads me to think it was broken before it was even boxed to be sent to me. Again, not going to affect the way it works but I had to hang it up differently than the others. It's pretty and I like it, but at the price with those issues, I think it should be cheaper, even without those issues, I think it's a bit overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Ness

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Chandelier!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bedroom and it is the perfect size and so so pretty! It is very light so just a small screw-in hook was all I needed to hang it. I did purchase a small chain separately and it was up in 3 minutes. Very happy with this chandelier, can't stop walking in my room to look at it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachell

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful, but smaller than I had imagined. It arrived with two of the candle holders broken. I attempted to contact the seller but have not heard back despite spending extra money for expedited shipping. Disappointed. Good price, just make sure you order in plenty of advance in case it arrives broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great, once you've done it YOUR way
customer_reviews.text: You can doctor this thing up your own way. The bones of the product are good. Mine is swagged out so it's a conversation piece. Accessories, and you'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous for my outdoor gazebo. Glued the glass to the metal, bought extender chain and battery votives as another reviewer suggested and love, love love!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Roo

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!! I glued the glass cups to the chandelier and it has survived 5+ storms (including a nearby tornado) in a gazebo. Everyone who sees it loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Very beutiful
customer_reviews.text: It is small check measurements. I love it. But becare full when washing the glass cups because the purple stain glass cup do come off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS FAR BETTER IN PERSON!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful accent piece that gives your outdoor space great character. Opt for the real candles, the recommended LED candles, while they are cute, are a distraction because they email very little lite.
customer_reviews.author: Wayburn

customer_reviews.title: too pricey
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is pretty but much smaller than expected . Too expensive for product
customer_reviews.author: leann

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very elegant looking. Be sure to gently wash with warm water and a tissue so the beautifully tinted glassware stays nice.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria P

customer_reviews.title: Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: Put this item in my office to replace a smaller one. It looks great and I was pleasantly surprised of the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Heinack

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great when I needed a replacement glass. I sent an email directly to the company and instead of one replace my votive, I got 2!!! It looks great in my gazebo and always gets compliments. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go in my outdoor gazebo over the hot tub - and its perfect! The beading on it is dark enough, that outdoors, it doesn't show the dust - but not too fancy that it doesn't fit. Gives good light over our hot tub at night. We really like it and I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting it to be so pretty. The picture doesn't do it justice! Fast shipper
customer_reviews.author: chachaney12

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chandelier, but didn’t want anything hardwired so this is perfect! I got remote controlled candles and a hook, and through this up in less than 15 minutes. The glass is not attached to the base so be careful not to drop the candle cups
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Haun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to review as I love it. The glass candle holders are poorly made. I’m hoping I can find other ones. I have small lighted candles in them with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spreng

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made for like a girls playhouse or dollhouse not anything you put in a home or anywhere significant
customer_reviews.author: jon lake

customer_reviews.title: A BIT SMALL BUT SO PRETTY. GOES GREAT WITH MY WALL DECOR
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A CUTE CANDELABRA. DECIDED TO TAKE OFF THE GLASSES AND USED LED INSTEAD, A BIT SMALL BUT SO PRETTY. GOES GREAT WITH MY WALL DECOR.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous chandeliers
customer_reviews.text: I replaced glass votives 4 remote control battery operated candles
customer_reviews.author: memphisgirl

customer_reviews.title: Small but attractive
customer_reviews.text: I suggest hot gluing the votive glass to the holders because the lip is very shallow and the slightest movement will cause them to fall. Other than that we’re happy with it. Unfortunately the remote controlled tea lights that are suggested could be brighter.
customer_reviews.author: mobile dj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my daughter she loved it received on time I would recommend to others small problem but the co. was quick to fix
customer_reviews.author: brenda widemann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory to my Gazebo. I need to purchase better lighting to go in the glass though. Another satisfied customer>
customer_reviews.author: Isa Shabazz

customer_reviews.title: Great for a child's dollhouse only
customer_reviews.text: Very petite. It's cute, but much, much smaller than what I would want. Perfect for a child's dollhouse, though.
customer_reviews.author: lovely

customer_reviews.title: Super Pretty Over the Jacuzzi
customer_reviews.text: This Chandelier is very pretty and just the right size to hang over the corner jacuzzi tub in the Master Bath! It was easy to hang- i did go ahead and get the recommended Swag hook/chain/ and battery operated flameless Mooncandles and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth phillips

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this addition to our gazebo!! Sturdy well made product that has with stood the West Texas winds very well. I use it over our spa for that extra ambiance factor.
customer_reviews.author: Rick grimsley

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this is a super cute candle holder
customer_reviews.text: I got it for patio but cant leave the glass holders on when not in use as they may blow away, I may glue them LOL. Other than that this is a super cute candle holder!! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: shan812000

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful elegant piece. Does not look cheap in anyway! I will probably hot glue the glass candle cups in place so they don't fall. It was packaged wonderfully I was worried it would break on its way to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, will work great for outdoor lighting. Got w the remote control battery operated candles. 1.8 in. Looks great together! Waiting for the chain and ready for romantic evenings to begin!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Foemmel

customer_reviews.title: Product came in good shape. Not quite as fancy as we were ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came in good shape. Not quite as fancy as we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: 4k's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's Beatiful! Just what I was looking for and worth every penny. Even more.
customer_reviews.author: irene a james

customer_reviews.title: Not robust for outside.
customer_reviews.text: Not robust design for outside. I had to glue the glass down since the side metal wells dont hold the glass. A bit smaller that what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Globes disformed in color
customer_reviews.text: Disliked how the well memes are dis formed in color
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small but it will do. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Erma A.

customer_reviews.title: If hanging outaide glue down the glass ro peotect it from the wind blowing them off
customer_reviews.text: This is just the sexiest part of my gazebo .. Had to gorilla glue the glass holder down to keep them from falling feomt the wind but everything is perfect and well under price for the product i would jave paid more for this sexy piece..
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: This looks great in my outdoor gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my outdoor gazebo! I also glues the glass to the chandelier and put remote control battery operated lights in them.. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier looks nice. The first one came broken. The seller replaced it very quickly. The second chandelier is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Olga181

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's hanging in my living room and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's hanging in my living room and adds a beautiful feel. My living room is pretty small so the size works well. I bought flameless candles for it with a remote. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McCray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this... Looks so pretty hanging above my dining room table. I just wish I could find some sort of brighter light option for it besides candles or battery powered candles...
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great beautiful item.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Love that it doesn't need electricity or attached to a huge cord. Beautiful and timeless decor. Looks beautiful. Should have been$ 25 to $30. Great.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: If broken or defect ship on your own to the seller outside USA
customer_reviews.text: Glass etched on side walls and don't look what you see on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: raghbir singh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So very cute. Used it in our outdoor tent for party. Now it hangs over my daughter's kitchen table
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Its not as big as you might think and you have to buy the additional hardware but its cute I love the smoked glass
customer_reviews.text: its cute and came fast. Its not as big as you might think and you have to buy the additional hardware but its cute I love the smoked glass. it is exactly what it says
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but smaller than I expected. I used different flameless led candles that were too big to fit so I couldn't use the glass cups. Still, it came out beautiful and gothic/romantic looking in my gazebo
customer_reviews.author: R Fam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy I put this in my garzebo looks really pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jenny m.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and multi-use!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! It works as a table centerpiece as well. We are using it as a chandelier in our gazebo. So moody! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty, just as pictured. One of the prisims was broken, but overall am happy with purchase. When all of the candles are lit, it gives off a soft light that is bright enough without being too bright.
customer_reviews.author: elaine patton

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect in our outside gazebo. We glued the glass jars down so they would not fall off during heavy winds.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute chandelier for a pergala
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as it said it was. perfect size. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Tina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice in our gazebo
customer_reviews.text: I did glue the glass holders into place. Very nice in our gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly tiny for the price. I thought this would be bigger. It's really nice, very pretty, but rather small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my decor perfectly for Halloween, although I had to purchase a separate chain to match for hanging from my 9 ft. ceilings. (LED candles were purchased separately also).
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: excellent!  way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I thought it would be. Heavy duty not flimsy at all. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chandelier! It's pretty heavy, so an appropriate weight ceiling hook and chain is necessary. I put double sided tape on the bottoms of the glass candle cups to keep them securely attached as the lip on the base is pretty low. The crystals are glass, not acrylic like similarly priced candle chandeliers. If you're planning on using remote control led candles, I'd recommend getting ones with the brightest possible cool white colored flame since the smoke gray colored glass has a bit of a dimming effect.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: but it was really nice.
customer_reviews.text: I return this item it was to small, but it was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely, however a few hanging crystals missing and delivered without packing slips or return info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the average candle. Waiting. For ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the average candle. Waiting. For credit to be corrected. I received two chandeliers in error, and was charged for return of one.
customer_reviews.author: joanneblance

customer_reviews.title: It rattled like broken glass but when I opened it I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Was terrified when my chandelier in a beat up torn box I was afraid to open it. It sat in the floor in my living room for 3 days until I was brave enough to open it. It rattled like broken glass but when I opened it I was pleasantly surprised to find all pieces intact thanks to the company's excellent packing. The rattling I heard was the chandelier chains. I had originally thought of sending it back but when I saw how pretty it is, I decided to remodel my walk-in closet with a Breakfast at Tiffany's theme and hand this right in the center with sparkle lights.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi C

customer_reviews.title: ... in the picture than in person but overall I'm satisfied. Debra R
customer_reviews.text: The Verdugo Chandelier did meet my expectations the only thing was it looked larger in the picture than in person but overall I'm satisfied. Debra R.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I set it up above my bathtub ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I set it up above my bathtub and its just amazing,! I so recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The candle chandelier was exactly as I expected. Very pretty. I received the product quickly and am very satisfied over all. The only dislike with the chandelier was the candle holder that holds the glass votive, it's too shallow and the glass votive can fall out easily. I bought some Velcro and fixed the problem. I knew about this ahead of time from reading other reviews but was not a problem for me. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaTorok

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! I recently purchased a pavilion for my deck and this chandelier really sets off the atmosphere that I was looking for! It looks very nice and has a nice glow. The tea lights that it requires are a bit low and I do need additional lighting on the table but it is a very nice touch and I love it. I bought black chain from the hardware store as I needed a longer piece but was able to mount this chandelier at the right height. The beading makes it! Everyone who sees it really likes to too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Liszewski

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect in my gazebo
customer_reviews.text: It came day's earlier than expected. It fits perfect in my gazebo. I did add the Flameless Candle Tea Lights to it also.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Our Review
customer_reviews.text: OUR MIDNIGHT ELEGANCE CHANDELIER It is quite lively and fits perfectly in our gazebo. We had many compliments and are enjoying our evenngs outoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered to use outside. Will work well for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to use outside. Will work well for this purpose. Very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Who do I have to contact ? I need a single glass holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Roberts

customer_reviews.title: nice goes with my wall sconces
customer_reviews.text: nice goes with my wall sconces, but a little disappointed not because of the item, but because I could not hang in ceiling. cheap ceiling could not hall chandelier. great! price.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Very elegant and not too flashy.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look as polished when received and the glass is black not clear as pictured. We painted it and are now looking for glass to match it.
customer_reviews.author: TOG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful outdoor chandelier! Does not look cheap in any way - we put it in our outdoor gazeebo & it was stunning! Exactly what I was looking for. We did glue the glass candle cups & they stay in place perfect not. Shipping was fast, couldn't be happier about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: meghan wendt

customer_reviews.title: Hung one over my hot tub and another one under ...
customer_reviews.text: Hung one over my hot tub and another one under another gazebo the chandelier is smaller than I expected and I would return it and see if I can find a bigger one the candles I bought were too dim and insignificant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love it !!
customer_reviews.text: its absolutely gorgeous, they candle holders on it has that dark purple color with the candles light looks just right. if u r wondering about the size its perfect not too big not too small. it adds up the perfect touch to your dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Aissar Bani Yaseen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Glass shades are not attached to base of the chandelier. A safety harzard
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Casey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the picture, very cheap! Dollar store material! Spent way too much money on it! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya porretta

customer_reviews.title: it can easily be re-purposed after the event is over
customer_reviews.text: I'll be using this "chandelier" at my daughter's wedding...it can easily be re-purposed after the event is over...it's very nice. I will be using remote control candles instead of real ones to display in my sunroom. I sort-of wish this came in white, but the black will add a nice contrast to the typical "white wedding." While it could be spray painted, I"m happy with the black...and so is my daughter! It's a nice quality piece...Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this about a year ago. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a year ago. It is quite lovely. I have it hanging in my gazebo. Unlike many other reviewers, I did not glue the glass votive holders in place. I hang it when using the gazebo and take it down/place it on the table when not in use. During high winds, I bring it inside. I've used both, real and battery powered candles. The real ones leave a waxy mess. I'm still trying to find remote battery powered tea lights/votives that last. The ones I purchased didn't last long before they stopped working altogether. All in all, this candle chandelier makes a bold statement & is quite elegant
customer_reviews.author: C. Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty. My only concern is the smoke colored vases. Some people said they glued theirs down. I don't want to glue the vases, because cleaning these while they're glued down, has to be difficult. I'll try Velcro first. If that doesn't work, I'll do something else, but something will have to be done before these cute vases break.
customer_reviews.author: CCMor

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at how lovely this chandelier is. Outside of the acrylic beading (which, because it's black, makes it difficult to tell that it's not real glass), everything else is of pretty high quality. It is also bigger than I thought it would be. The votive holders are real glass and the chandelier is heavy - not the inexpensive, lightweight metal that I was expecting. All it needs, is a chain to hang it from, which can be purchased for next-to-nothing at Home Depot. I am *very* pleased. What a lovely piece! Also, though I wasn't in a hurry to receive it, the shipping was super-fast.
customer_reviews.author: LizNBntown

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice from afar, but far from nice.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, holders for the candles are crooked, I put magnets under the votive so they wouldn't fall off. I would not use outside, a breeze would knock the votives off.Cheap plastic beads, one strand not attached completely. I have it over my bathroom tub...looks nice from afar, but far from nice.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Barber-Miner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased to have hanging off our cantilever umbrella out on the patio. It gives a great, high class look to the patio. We originally received 1 votive cup that had strange marks in the glass of the votive cup but Sunshine Megastores quickly sent out a replacement. Great customer service and a nice chandelier
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Gazebo decor
customer_reviews.text: I hung this in my gazebo a few months ago and it's perfect. It's been outside in the elements under a leaky gazebo roof and it has no signs of rusting. One of the glass holders was dropped and busted the day we got it, and Verdugo quickly sent me 2 holders free of charge. Top notch customer service. I put velcro on the cups to keep them in place. I'd buy it again for sure
customer_reviews.author: jessk55

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Candle Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle chandelier. It is very well made and the candlelight shows up beautifully. I had an issue with a broken glass votive holder upon arrival and sent a picture of the damage to the vendor - the vendor responded by immediately sending me 2 to replace the damaged one...with a nice note that I'd have a replacement, should any further mishaps occur. Now that's great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the glass cups for the candles just sit on top of a platform and since this is an outdoor chandelier I don't see that holding up on a windy day. And a side note altho nothing broke the box came in ripped and dented.
customer_reviews.author: Jenice Hadnagy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for the romantic
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is GORGEOUS! I have it hanging above my bed in my master bedroom and its a really romantic and dramatic piece. It's beautiful, heavy and well made I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for my gazebo.
customer_reviews.text: I did hot glue the cups in to make them more stable as this will be hanging from my gazebo. My only complaint is the weight of the cups. They are indeed glass (which makes me nervous). I do wish they had an acrylic option as if this falls it will be a nightmare to clean up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing outdoor chandelier.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for in my gazebo! It's built well, like another review said on here make sure you hot glue the cups down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I sent an email to seller as soon as I received this item. Never got a response. It is welded crooked..there is paint on almost everyone of the glasses..and a strand of the beads are broken!! It is total junk!!
customer_reviews.author: shooze

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits perfectly in my tiny house. I used black velcro on the glasses to keep them safely on their holders. I purchased about 2 ft of black chain. Turns out it was a bit too long- twice as much as I needed with my low ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Kopperrose

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and was as expected. This faux chandelier flowed perfectly with the rest of my outdoor party decorum. I was pleased with the product and it's quality. I would definitely order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: cateyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Glamping
customer_reviews.text: This is our Glamping chandelier which we hang over our bed in our tent. Beautiful and the remote control makes it perfect to turn off before going to sleep. The only thing I added was some Velcro under each glass candle holder so if we bumped it, they wouldn't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle chandelier. Bought it to mount above my spa. I bought some remote control tea light candles to put in the glass holders. Also, this does not come with the chain so I had to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: SkysLimit

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It looks very classy hanging in my gazebo. It's a little small, but that may be a good thing because it's very windy where I live on the river and the small size keeps it from blowing around. You do need a chain with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love this
customer_reviews.text: love love love this. the votive holders are not very secure so i glued them to the chandelier with a hot glue gun. works like a charm i bought the recommended led votive candles and they work and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED WITH MY PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. It is simply adorable. It has created the most romantic ambiance without the hassles of electrical wiring.
customer_reviews.author: NaraNara

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Lovely item, amazing deal, honestly. It arrived six days early and in great shape despite being fragile. I intend to use this chandelier for the next ten years. The cups are separate from the body of it and may need to be glued on but that's no problem for me. Thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lilybones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, it was exactly what I was looking for when entertaining outside. You do have to glue the glass down because it can fall off but I was totally ok with that. I looked for other outdoor chandeliers this size and couldn't find one in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Irisheyes99

customer_reviews.title: I had to glue the Glass votive holders to their ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to glue the Glass votive holders to their bases otherwise they would have fallen off if bumped/jiggled at all.
customer_reviews.author: VSD
